item.title: Misinformation on Dockerhub Rate Limits
item.description: In April 2025, Docker Inc withdrew plans to further constrain Docker Hub Rate Limits. So rate limits remain unchanged at: Account Type Limit anonymous users 100 pulls per 6 hours per IP address authenticated users 200 pulls per 6 hour period paid subscribers Unlimited pulls (up from 5000 pulls per day) But misinformation remains in AI responses, search results and registry vendor blogs.
